title: Print, "Design for a Napoleonic Canopy Bed"
medium: Etching, brush and watercolor and ink wash on heavy cream laid paper
markings: Watermark, upper left of center: crossed swords
inscribed: Imprinted in margin, upper right: Pl. 19; bottom center: Lit execute a Paris pour Mme. M.
description: Napoleonic canopy bed with antique motifs throughout; hand colored in red, blue, lilac, yellow, and brown with black ink wash.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Napoleonic Canopy Bed".
Etching, brush and watercolor and ink wash on heavy cream laid paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-400.
